item.description: How to Enable TOC Create toc.ejs add following content at yourTheme/layout/widget/toc.ejs <% var content = page.content; if (is_post() && content) { %> <div class="widget-wrap"> <h3 class="widget-title">Table of Contents</h3> <div class="widget"> <%- toc(content) %> </div> </div> <% } %> Create toc.styl add following content at yourTheme/source/css/_partial/toc.styl then add @import "_partial/toc" to yourTheme/source/css/style.styl .toc li list-style: none finally # Sidebar widgets: - toc Add recent_update to sidebar add following content at yourTheme/layout/widget/recent_update.
